title: Piano Basics for Beginners
description: Learn to read sheet music and perform basic finger warm-ups in this intro piano course.
video: <video controls width='300'><source src='demo-piano1.mp4' type='video/mp4'>Your browser does not support the video tag.</video>

topics.title: 🎵 Music Reading
topics.content: Learn to identify notes, rhythms, and symbols used in basic sheet music. Develop foundational reading skills for melody and timing.

topics.title: 🎹 Finger Exercises
topics.content: Practice beginner-friendly exercises that improve finger independence, strength, and agility on the piano keys.

topics.title: 👐 Hand Positioning
topics.content: Develop proper hand posture to play comfortably and reduce the risk of injury.

title: Intermediate Piano Harmony
description: Explore rich piano harmonies, develop your chord vocabulary, and start improvising freely.
video: <video controls width='300'><source src='demo-piano2.mp4' type='video/mp4'>Your browser does not support the video tag.</video>

topics.title: 🎼 Chord Progressions
topics.content: Understand how chords move in a musical context and apply them creatively.

topics.title: 🎹 Improvisation
topics.content: Learn to express your musical ideas in real-time using scales and harmony.

topics.title: 🔍 Harmonic Structure
topics.content: Analyze the harmony of your favorite songs and apply similar structures in your playing.

title: Lead Guitar Techniques
description: Master advanced electric guitar skills with focus on soloing, bending, and fast runs.
video: <video controls width='300'><source src='demo-guitar1.mp4' type='video/mp4'>Your browser does not support the video tag.</video>

topics.title: 🎼 Scales
topics.content: Use scales as the foundation for lead guitar improvisation and melody.

topics.title: 🎯 String Bending
topics.content: Add emotion and fluidity to your solos with precise bending techniques.

topics.title: 🔥 Soloing
topics.content: Combine licks and phrasing to create expressive, professional guitar solos.

title: Acoustic Guitar for Starters
description: Start your acoustic guitar journey with open chords and rhythm techniques.
video: <video controls width='300'><source src='demo-guitar2.mp4' type='video/mp4'>Your browser does not support the video tag.</video>

topics.title: 🎶 Open Chords
topics.content: Learn essential open chord shapes and how to transition smoothly between them.

topics.title: 🥁 Strumming Patterns
topics.content: Develop rhythm skills through common strumming techniques.

topics.title: 🖐️ Basic Fingerpicking
topics.content: Explore introductory patterns to add texture and depth to your playing.

title: Flute Breathing Mastery
description: Improve your tone and control through focused breathing and phrasing exercises.
video: <video controls width='300'><source src='demo-flute1.mp4' type='video/mp4'>Your browser does not support the video tag.</video>

topics.title: 🌬️ Breath Control
topics.content: Train your diaphragm and breath support for longer, more controlled phrases.

topics.title: 🎵 Tone Quality
topics.content: Focus on embouchure and air stream to refine your flute sound.

topics.title: 🎶 Phrasing
topics.content: Learn to shape musical lines expressively with breath and articulation.

title: Violin Fundamentals
description: A perfect start for violin learners, focusing on bow hold, posture, and open string play.
video: <video controls width='300'><source src='demo-violin1.mp4' type='video/mp4'>Your browser does not support the video tag.</video>

topics.title: 🎻 Posture
topics.content: Develop correct violin and bow hold to ensure a strong foundation.

topics.title: 🪶 Basic Bowing
topics.content: Practice straight bow strokes and smooth transitions.

topics.title: 🎼 Tuning
topics.content: Learn how to tune your instrument using pegs and fine tuners.

title: Advanced Violin Performance
description: Perform demanding pieces from the classical repertoire and refine your tone.
video: <video controls width='300'><source src='demo-violin2.mp4' type='video/mp4'>Your browser does not support the video tag.</video>

topics.title: 🎼 Concert Pieces
topics.content: Interpret advanced violin works with expression and technical precision.

topics.title: 🏹 Advanced Bowing
topics.content: Refine your control over various bowing techniques and articulations.

topics.title: 🎭 Stage Presence
topics.content: Enhance your performance confidence and audience engagement.

title: Jazz Improvisation for Piano
description: Discover voicings and comping patterns that will level up your jazz piano playing.
video: <video controls width='300'><source src='demo-jazz-piano.mp4' type='video/mp4'>Your browser does not support the video tag.</video>

topics.title: 🎹 Jazz Voicings
topics.content: Learn rich chord voicings to add color and complexity to your playing.

topics.title: 🎷 Comping
topics.content: Master rhythmic accompaniment behind soloists in a jazz context.

topics.title: 🎶 Improvisation
topics.content: Explore phrasing, call-and-response, and spontaneous soloing techniques.

title: Pop Vocal Coaching
description: Train your voice with pop vocal techniques, expression, and tone control.
video: <video controls width='300'><source src='demo-vocals1.mp4' type='video/mp4'>Your browser does not support the video tag.</video>

topics.title: 🎤 Tone
topics.content: Develop consistent vocal tone for different pop genres.

topics.title: 🎵 Vocal Style
topics.content: Adapt your voice to suit pop styles and artist inspirations.

topics.title: 🌬️ Breath Control
topics.content: Strengthen breathing technique to support long and powerful phrases.

title: Solfège & Ear Training
description: Sharpen your musical ear through solfège, interval recognition, and rhythmic practice.
video: <video controls width='300'><source src='demo-theory1.mp4' type='video/mp4'>Your browser does not support the video tag.</video>

topics.title: 🔔 Intervals
topics.content: Identify and sing musical intervals by ear.

topics.title: ⏱️ Rhythm Exercises
topics.content: Practice clapping and reading rhythm patterns in various time signatures.

topics.title: 🎧 Pitch Recognition
topics.content: Improve your ability to recognize and reproduce musical notes by ear.

title: Children's Music Class
description: Fun and interactive intro to sound, rhythm, and musical games for kids aged 4–7.
video: <video controls width='300'><source src='demo-kids1.mp4' type='video/mp4'>Your browser does not support the video tag.</video>

topics.title: 🎲 Rhythm Games
topics.content: Interactive games to develop timing and coordination.

topics.title: 🎵 Pitch Play
topics.content: Explore high and low sounds through songs and toys.

topics.title: 🔍 Sound Exploration
topics.content: Discover sound with everyday objects and instruments.

title: Folk Singing Workshop
description: Explore traditional Bulgarian folk singing with ornamentation and open-throat technique.
video: <video controls width='300'><source src='demo-folk.mp4' type='video/mp4'>Your browser does not support the video tag.</video>

topics.title: 🎙️ Bulgarian Ornamentation
topics.content: Learn decorative vocal styles unique to Bulgarian folk music.

topics.title: 🎶 Open-throat Singing
topics.content: Practice vocal production techniques for volume and resonance.

topics.title: 🪗 Folk Traditions
topics.content: Understand the cultural context and stories behind folk songs.

title: Choir Harmony Essentials
description: Step into the world of group singing. Learn to blend, follow a conductor, and hold harmony parts confidently.
video: <video controls width='300'><source src='demo-choir.mp4' type='video/mp4'>Your browser does not support the video tag.</video>

topics.title: 🎼 Singing in Harmony
topics.content: Understand the basics of vocal harmony and how to stay on your part while others sing different lines.

topics.title: 👂 Active Listening
topics.content: Develop the skill of listening and adjusting to the group while maintaining your own pitch and rhythm.

topics.title: 🫱 Conductor Cues
topics.content: Learn to follow visual cues from a conductor to stay in sync with the ensemble.
